channel.title: Need help on using Hd and Ld Clients
channel.description: I need help loading open clients that are Hd and Ld.Every time i open one up, it loads quickly to something that says "connecting to server" and just stays there for a long time and moves nowhere.Always happens and i want to start using Hd and Ld Clients.I have a windows exp 2000.Can anyone help me?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2009, 08:39:27 pm[/size][hr]like whenever i open a client it doesnt load through.does it have to do with my computer or java or what?anybody?

item.title: Need help on using Hd and Ld Clients
